# Moving Average
tcs['MA50'] = tcs['Close'].rolling(50).mean()
tcs['MA200'] = tcs['Close'].rolling(200).mean()
tcs['Open'].plot(figsize = (15,7), label='Close')
tcs['MA50'].plot(label='MA50')
tcs['MA200'].plot(label='MA200')
plt.legend()
plt.show()
source.9e24b53d:
# Bolinger Band
tcs['MA50_STD'] = tcs['Adj Close'].rolling(50).std()
tcs['Upper_band'] = tcs['MA50'] + (tcs['MA50_STD'] * 2)
tcs['Lower_band'] = tcs['MA50'] - (tcs['MA50_STD'] * 2)
tcs[['MA50','Upper_band','Lower_band']].plot()
plt.title('Bolinger Band TCS')
plt.ylabel('Adjusted Close Price')
plt.show()
